Uses of Class
com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security.CertificateVerifier

  • Packages that use CertificateVerifier 
    Package Description
    com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security  

    • Uses of CertificateVerifier in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security

      Subclasses of CertificateVerifier in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CRLVerifier
      Class that allows you to verify a certificate against one or more Certificate Revocation Lists.
      class  LtvVerifier
      Verifies the signatures in an LTV document.
      class  OCSPVerifier
      Class that allows you to verify a certificate against one or more OCSP responses.
      class  RootStoreVerifier
      Verifies a certificate against a KeyStore containing trusted anchors.
      Fields in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security declared as CertificateVerifier 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CertificateVerifier CertificateVerifier.verifier
      The previous CertificateVerifier in the chain of verifiers.
      Fields in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security with type parameters of type CertificateVerifier 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Class<? extends CertificateVerifier> VerificationOK.verifierClass
      The CertificateVerifier that was used for verifying.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets an extra verifier.
      Constructors in com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security with parameters of type CertificateVerifier 
      Constructor and Description
      CertificateVerifier(CertificateVerifier verifier)
      Creates the final CertificateVerifier in a chain of verifiers.

      Creates an OCSPVerifier instance.
